##How to upload new/updated files to the Github Repository

If you have a project in RStudio which is connected to a Github Repository, you will want to make sure that the changes you've made are reflected on Github. This will allow collaborators to access the most up-to-date version of the files, inclusive of any changes that you might have made.

*Click here* for a tutorial on how to connect your Github repository with RStudio.
